25350,"Out of the Silent Planet (The Space Trilogy, #1)",0007157150,9780007157150,,B085W12MZJ,ATVPDKIKX0DER,US,https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1310984018l/25350._SX98_.jpg,https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/books/1310984018l/25350._SY75_.jpg,2005,12,5,HarperCollins,eng,false,"In the first novel of C.S. Lewis's classic science fiction trilogy, Dr Ransom, a Cambridge academic, is abducted and taken on a spaceship to the red planet of Malacandra, which he knows as Mars. His captors are plotting to plunder the planet's treasures and plan to offer Ransom as a sacrifice to the creatures who live there.
